#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
 
int main()
{
    long long int i,l,r,s;
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    long long int p[] =

      93839, 93939, 94049, 94149, 94249, 94349, 94449, 94549, 94649, 94749, 94849, 94949, 95059, 95159, 95259, 95359, 95459, 95559, 95659,
      95759, 95859, 95959, 96069, 96169, 96269, 96369, 96469, 96569, 96669, 96769, 96869, 96969, 97079, 97179, 97279, 97379, 97479, 97579,
      97679, 97779, 97879, 97979, 98089, 98189, 98289, 98389, 98489, 98589, 98689, 98789, 98889, 98989, 99099, 99199, 99299, 99399, 99499,
      99599, 99699, 99799, 99899, 99999, 100001
    };
    if(t>0&&t<=100)
    while(t--)
    {  s=0;
        i=0;
      scanf("%lld%lld",&l,&r);
        for(i=0;p[i]<=r;i++)
        {
            if(p[i]>=l)
            {
                s=s+p[i];
 
            }
        }
        printf("sum is %lld\n",s);
    }
 
    return 0;
}
